column2: playing loud filthy music while charging what they do is inexcusable
column3: but the on-duty manager's snotty attitude made it worse. The guy even seemed to hint that I was lying by claiming 'we have a vendor that provides our music
column4: they screen it for offensive content.' Â Uh
column6: pal. I know what I heard
column7: as does my wife. We were the last of about four customers left down in the Parlor when the trash came on
column8: there was zero noise outside of the clearly audible music.
